amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds from this Act from being used to support the Gaza pier.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waltz amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 209 - 200 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waltz amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 209 - 200 (Roll no. 321).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
